directions: Combine garlic, tapioca flour, fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar, and white pepper in a bowl; add prawns and toss to coat.

Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a heavy skillet over high heat. Add 1/2 of the prawns in single layer; fry until golden brown and crispy, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Repeat with remaining oil and remaining prawns.
ingredients: 8 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste
1/4 cup vegetable oil, divided, or as needed
title: Goong Tod Kratiem Prik Thai (Prawns Fried with Garlic and White Pepper)
